fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations
head_office_address: Monasterio di San Nicolò Riviera San Nicolò 26
eu_initiatives: EU human rights and democracy related policies and initiatives, such as EIDHR, Global Strategy of the European Union’s Foreign and Security Policy, and the European Neighbourhood Policy etc.
organisation_name: European Inter-University Center for Human Rights and Democratisation (EIUC)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: meetings with members of the European Parliament on human rights related issues; events involving COHOM delegates and EEAS representatives (e.g. Diplomatic Conference); activities in cooperation with the European Parliament (Sakharov Fellowship Award); regular meetings with DEVCO counterparts in relation to the management of the project;
legal_status: No-profit association recognized under Italian law
goals__remit: The mission of EIUC is to develop as a strategic hub for the advancement, interconnection and coordination of key human resources and expertise in the area of human rights in all regions of the world, working with stakeholders at the governmental, inter-governmental and civil society levels. We do so by strengthening the regional and global dimensions of human rights and democracy through education, training, research, promotional activities, and specialised advice, to contribute to sustainable peace, justice, and development.
